name: Brain Busters (vh-games)
description:
Simple, short browser games with no files to download

The idea of each mini game was to do something unusual. The color spot game requires you to disregard the word you read, the axis game to focus on the symmetry of words, the pitch game is a simple guessing game for people with the perfect pitch and the digit sum game for quick calculations.

The music is randomly generated and different each time, but the title screen will always have a repeating piano melody.

All background images were taken by me on a trip to Sorrento (Naples, Pompeji). 

It was a lot of fun finally finishing the game (the color game had been sitting on my PC for a long time) and I hope you'll have fun playing it.
